entry.title: [EU][api.ovh.com] - API Migration

In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently postponed to 19/01/2022. Thank you for your understanding.

Scheduled - Start time : 19/01/2022 06:00 UTC

Service impact : None
Service improvement : The goal is to migrate the API endpoints that Enable the Control panel for Europe region to provide services to Costumers from the current hosting environnement to the new hosting environnement.
In case of incident, you might be able to authentify but Manager Control Panel might not be accessible or not respond during 10 / 15 minutes time required to roll back to the old platform.

entry.title: [Canada][Customer service] - Interactive voice support (IVR)
entry.content:
Jan 8, 22:01 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 07/01/2022 16:50 UTC
End Time : 07/01/2022 19:30 UTC
Root cause : This comes from an internal routing error

Jan 8, 11:23 UTC
Update - Investigation are still in progress. Thanks for your patience

Jan 8, 02:44 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are analyzing the network traces of the Voix router to see where the delay would come from.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding

Jan 7, 16:33 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : We plan a restarting of our VVB server (voice gateway) at 06:30 PM , that will impact and shutdown the calls for less than 5 minutes. We apologise for any inconvenience will be caused.

Jan 7, 16:03 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 07/01/2022 16:50 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience some delay during selection of the choice when you call support in Canada.
Ongoing actions : We are still investigating the cause of the problem. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
